sentences.en: Clearly, the application of brine or ammonia is feasible to control the growth of Cyclops.
sentences.cn: 可见, 采用盐水或氨水浸泡活性炭滤池来控制剑水蚤的生长是可行的.

sentences.en: Cyclops is a strong hand - to - hand fighter, with an ability to attack walls, when in siege battle.
sentences.cn: 独眼巨人是强力的近战兵种, 并且具有在攻城战中破坏城墙的能力.

sentences.en: Cyclops were giants with only one eye, like a lantern, in the center of their forehead.
sentences.cn: 独眼巨人是一些只有一只眼睛的巨人, 这只眼睛在他们前额的正中间, 像个灯笼.

sentences.en: The results indicate that chloramine is of notable inactivation effect on Cyclops.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,氯胺对剑水蚤具有显著的灭活作用.

trans.tran_cn: 塞克罗伯斯（希腊神话独眼巨人）
trans.tran_en: a very big man in ancient Greek stories who only had one eye in the middle of his forehead
